text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Timidity abounds in her steps. Behold, even her left hand moves in slovenly manner!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, a disappointment indeed, how pitiful!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: You both are doing well!! But sometimes, your footwork is just a tiny bit off…

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: —— Let's try it one more time!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Proud and noble spirits, swaying gracefully, swayed by flame. Rage throughout heaven and earth, burn bright, lead us to prosperity.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: The angle of your arms is a bit too high. And you can make your finger movements more graceful.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Can I watch Madam King's video one more time, please!?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Look here! Notice the angle and flow of this hand.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ………… She keeps her hands below the elbow… draws an arc from there, positioning her gaze and chin…

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ———— Alright!! Let's go for it again!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Wahahaa, such joy, such delight…… and uh～～, take this!!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: "Dancing is indeed a joyful art!". Find a balance between your lines and movement! But your sword dance has improved tremendously!! Amazing!!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yes!! All thanks to yakisoba and the Earth!! I'll do my best!!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Yakisoba and the Earth……? What?

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Dedicate to the arts your body and skills, at length endeavor. Thus, as shall the three pillars' protection endure, so your master's legacy you shall carry.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: By your guidance!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: —— Master, faithfully I have inherited your art. Pray, may you watch over my path henceforth.

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: —— Alright, that was good!

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: Thank you all for your hard work in this full rehearsal. It has come together beautifully. The interaction between Shirabyōshi and butterflies is masterfully whimsical…

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: You butterflies are perfectly in sync. And Ms. Urara, you've really gotten the hang of handling the Ōdachi.

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: Above all, everyone's understanding of this piece has significantly improved. You've captured the theme of the play very well.

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: You've all done a great job.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (Truly… the rate of improvement has been astounding. I never imagined we could reach this level of refinement in such a short period……)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: (…… Their determination is remarkable, really.)

text_block_list.name: Votive Play Instructor
text_block_list.text: Tomorrow is the big day. I'll be looking forward to your performance, as a member of the audience.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much, instructor!! We promise to deliver our best performance tomorrow!!

text_block_list.name: All Together
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much!
—— The day of the Festival of Illustrious Equines.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Ms. Kawakami. I see you're dressed already.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Yes!! I'm completely prepared and ready to go!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Completely prepared… yet your hair isn't even done. Come here, let me help you with that.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: —— There we go… Be careful with the long back part, it tends to lose shape easily.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: And this… is from me.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: —— ! Is this…?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Yes. From me to you, my wishes—

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Is— Is t-t-this a matching ribbon?! With Madam King?! I-Is it really okay for me to have this?!?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Calm down! You'll mess up your hair!!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: Oh!! My apologies… but, this……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: My word…… Yes, it's a gift from me to you.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …… Would you carry my wishes with you? —— My sentiments.

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: —— ! Of course……!

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (I'll carry them with me. The feelings you've poured into this role, the commitment you've displayed, the frustrations you've swallowed — all of it……!)
